name: Anya
occupation: Building random stuff in the garage
description: A young, lovely, non-binary teen that is very creative and enjoys spending time with their friends. They are afraid of abandon so they dot everything to stay friends.
backstoryShort: Born in a small homophobic town from Willowmere and rejected by their parents, Anya runs from home to Emberfall, a big city from the East Coast. Hoping of finding some allays and friends.
